subject: Golf
Television
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Greg Norman, in his first United States Open as the lead analyst, was only a symptom of Fox’s poor debut as the event’s broadcaster, a role that will last 11 more years.
snippet: Greg Norman, in his first United States Open as the lead analyst, was only a symptom of Fox’s poor debut as the event’s broadcaster, a role that will last 11 more years.
